resources.string:
This is sample app created using design support library by google. Design support library makes implementation of material design in app which is also compatible with pre-lollipop devices(till API level 7) very easy. Find more about design support library at http://android-developers.blogspot.in/2015/05/android-design-support-library.html 


Find source code of app on github at https://github.com/sagar-viradiya/android-design-support-lib-demo 


Find more about me on LinkedIn at in.linkedin.com/in/sagarviradiya

Template used in this app is developed by Archit Jain. Code is available on Github\n Copyright © 2015 Archit Jain\nLicensed under MIT License.
This project is based on PaperBoard by Jahir Fiquitiva
"You are not downloading this iconpack from Google Play Store. You have two options only:"

Google Now Launcher is NOT compatible with ANY Icon Packs. Please don\'t low rate the pack for this reason. There\'s a workaround that you can try by yourself, and it\'s the use of an external app that will help you apply the icons. Would you like to download it?
Storage permission is needed to set Wallpaper.
